entry.title: How long will we be friends?
entry.summary:
Author: minchanb0y

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,195Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 141

Summary: Seungmin has always been shy and reserved, quietly watching from afar the seven friends, all connected in a loving and harmonious polyamorous relationship. He secretly dreams of a love like that, but the fear of getting involved and losing their friendship or being rejected keeps him at a distance. However, the seven friends also notice his feelings and wish to win him over, beginning a delicate journey of discoveries, insecurities, and intense emotions, where love, friendship, and courage intertwine in a surprising way.

entry.title: Not Just An NDA
entry.summary:
Author: delusional_hour

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,894Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 4

Summary: At some point during the show, Rose had bumped Chris's shoulder and apologized. Not much later, while keeping his eyes focused on the stage, Chris reached his hand out and touched Rose’s hand, hoping it came off as an accident. Rose froze when she felt his hand against her own. He definitely lingered more than an accidental bump. Swallowing, Rose extended her fingers and grazed Chris's hand. Rose was still having a hard time wrapping her mind around the fact that these world famous K-Pop idols were the ones to reach out to her. There were already a bunch of what ifs forming in Rose’s mind. Rose had spent the better part of the past few years obsessed with the man beside her and his group. How could she do anything, but take the chance and get to know them.   This is my first fic on AO3 and my first SKZ fic. It started as a "what if" and one shots bounced around with friends, but I decided to actually post it after being told to write it down. This fic will focus on Rose (OC)/ Bang Chan's relationship with some other background relationships.

Summary: With the cheek cushioned against the dark leather padding, Felix tests the bindings holding his wrists. entry.title: Look at your face in the mirror (I am there inside)
entry.summary:
Author: Caliander

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,414Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: “Take your shirt off too.” Jisung slipped his coat from his shoulders. The heavy white-and-gold fabric whispered as it fell into his hands. When his fingers moved to his shirt, however, they stilled on the buttons. “Do I really have to?” His voice faltered. “I… I’m a bit shy to—” “Don’t you trust me?” The Angel’s voice reverberated through the dressing room, a sound so resonant it seemed to vibrate in Jisung’s ribs. “I do,” Jisung whispered. And he meant it — with his whole trembling heart.   “I’ll prove to you,” the voice promised, “that you’re perfect without those fancy garments.”   //The young tenor Han Jisung earns the lead role at the Paris Opera House, but the voices in his mind keep whispering that he’s unworthy.His devoted tutor, the Angel of Music, sings to silence those doubts, teaching him that love can sound a lot like worship… and worship can sound a lot like control.
